DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy application anaesthesia topical pharyngeal lidocaine esophagogastroduodenoscopy propofol´s sedation , therms dosage side effect´s reduction overall .
DOC.brief_title: Usefulness Lidocaine Topical Pharyngeal Anaesthesia Esophagogastroduodenoscopy Under Sedation With Propofol
DOC.criteria: Patient´s 18 year old receive standard indication sedate esophagogastroduodenoscopy ( American Society Gastrointestinal Endoscopy Guidelines ) centre period study .
